content:
This change affects the first printing. Revised text is highlighted.

You plant one of Kasende's lure amplifiers and set it to standby. As you move away, you see a blue light blinking at its top.

Discard all   from WORM FOOD and check off the bubble matching the current location next to WORM FOOD on the campaign tracker. Then, if both are complete, read the following:

The lure amplifiers are set. Now you need to meet Kasende in the Marsh of Rebirth and activate the lure itself.

Complete the WORM FOOD mission and gain the JOURNEY (MARSH OF REBIRTH) mission. If you are on LOST BROTHER, complete that mission as you settle on this approach to resolving the reclaimer threat.
